Actions.Name: Behold
Actions.Effects: The Gazer rolls 1d6 and applies one of the following effects to the attack target, which last until the end of its next turn.

Rolls.Name: Scour Gravity
Rolls.Description: The target gains flying, but at the end of their turn, they fall, shattering them.

Rolls.Name: Scour Friction
Rolls.Description: The target doubles its speed, but must move maximum speed when moving and cannot only move in one direction for each action.

Rolls.Name: Scour Force
Rolls.Description: The target cannot deal damage, but also becomes immune to all damage for the duration.

Rolls.Name: Scour Scale
Rolls.Description: The target increases its size to 3. It can share space with foes during this effect.

Rolls.Name: Scour Time
Rolls.Description: The target immediately rolls a d20 and their class damage die. All of their results for any of those dice rolled during this turn become the respective rolled result (so, for example, if a 13 was rolled on the d20, all d20 rolls on their turn would be 13).

Rolls.Name: Scour Space
Rolls.Description: The target may teleport to any space for 1 action. However, for the duration, all characters may teleport to any space adjacent to this character for 1 action.

Actions.Name: Shock
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 takes 2 damage, then must save or become shattered.

Actions.Name: Nullify
Actions.Description: The Gazer becomes sturdy, and places down a blast 1 terrain effect in an adjacent area. These effects last both until the Gazer moves. While in the area, characters deal half damage.
